result.purpose: This folder is responsible for containing unit tests for various cron job tasks related to gaming data crawlers.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, focusing on unit testing individual components of the cron jobs service.

tests/services/cron-jobs/axie_crawler_ta.purpose: Unit tests for the Axie crawler task in the cron jobs service.

tests/services/cron-jobs/classic_game_pl.purpose: Unit tests for the classic game played crawler task in the cron jobs service.

tests/services/cron-jobs/console_games_c.purpose: Unit test for the ConsoleGamesCrawlerTask in the cron_jobs package.

tests/services/cron-jobs/origins_game_pl.purpose: Unit tests for the origins game played cron job functionality.

tests/services/cron-jobs/summer_axie_cra.purpose: Unit tests for the Summer Axie Crawler task in the cron jobs service.
